articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: What HCA Healthcare (HCA)'s Upbeat 2025 Guidance and Buybacks Mean For Shareholders. HCA Healthcare recently prepared to release its fiscal fourth-quarter results, following a year in which it raised 2025 guidance to US$75.00–US$76.50 billion in revenue and US$27–US$28 earnings per share after repeatedly beating earnings estimates. Behind those numbers, an aggressive share repurchase program that has cut the share count by about 44% since 2015 has helped earnings per share grow faster than revenue, reinforcing investor attention on how HCA deploys its growing free cash...
